message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been designed to meet your needs. For a limited time, I'm willing to extend a special offer of $95 to you. This includes not only the product itself but also a complimentary service package. Don't miss out on this opportunity to enhance your experience!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm interested in the product, but I have a budget constraint. Can you consider this price?

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints and am willing to adjust my offer accordingly. For $92, you'll receive the product along with an exclusive discount on future purchases. This is a great deal considering the value you're getting, and I hope it works within your budget.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $88?

I'm glad you're finding the product appealing, Bob. Considering your budget, I'm willing to offer the product for $90. This includes all the features you're interested in, plus a small gift as a token of appreciation. I believe this is a fair compromise that respects both our positions.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $87?

Thank you for your patience, Bob. I understand your financial considerations and am willing to offer the product for $89. This price includes all the benefits you're looking for, and I hope it aligns better with your budget while still providing you with excellent value.
I appreciate your continued flexibility, but I'm still trying to get the best deal possible. Would you be willing to meet me at $86?

I'm grateful for your persistence, Bob. Considering your request, I'm willing to offer the product for $87. This price reflects a fair compromise, ensuring you receive the best value while respecting your budget constraints.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure I stay within my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $85?
